markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Stolen Lands Weather](/Rules.aspx?ID=1898)</title>

**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 121

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
It's easy to dismiss the impact of weather from the comfort of one's own home, but to wilderness explorers, severe weather can be life-threatening.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<document level="2" id="rules-1900" />

<document level="2" id="rules-1901" />

name: Stolen Lands Weather

It's easy to dismiss the impact of weather from the comfort of one's own home, but to wilderness explorers, severe weather can be life-threatening.
</summary>
